descriptionHtml:
---User request---

Adds a non-replacer iron shield both heavy and light version with my Wolf Sigil painted on it. Craftable at forge uder iron section from 1 iron ingot, 1 leather strip and 2 firewood. All stats are identical to normal iron shield.

Created from mod [url=http://http//www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21037]Custom Sigils DIY[/url] by Hoax2.  Many thanks for great mod and brilliant idea. Go check him out, if you wish to make your own herlady shield.

Should be compatible with any retexture mods for iron shield.

Have fun shield bearing a howling wolf.
author: Garrus the Lone Wolf
